page.title: 02ATTITUDES IN FORFAR
page.content: {Town.}A group of pupils in Chapelpark school are writing their views of Forfar.The population of Forfar is 12,500.In parts of Forfar it is noisy especially if an event of some kind is taking place.Forfar is famous for its bridies.{Sport}In Forfar we have a BMX track which is not far from the loch.We have a bowling green in the Reid Park.We also have an outdoor paddling pool and trampolines.We have our own Leisure Centre where you can play badminton or squash.The town of Forfar has an indoor swimming pool.We have a hall where plays are performed.This is called the Reid Hall.Every year at differant seasons we have a circus and fairground.Half way around the loch there is a sailing club where you can hire boats to sail on the loch.
